DESCRIPTION: Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project's build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.
Skip the build and redeploy process. JRebel reloads changes to Java classes, resources, and over 100 frameworks.
So you can rule your code. Not the bugs. No more mocks. No more container lifecycle and deployment hassles. Just real tests!
Build, Ship, Run! An open platform for distributed applications for developers and sysadmins
